block.seadwellers.sea_rope.description_0: §b■ §7The sturdy rope on which to grow §fmussels§7.
info.dragon_hurt: ■ §4I'm hurt and I don't want to talk!
info.dragon_quest_10_start: ■ §2If you want more, bring me the Netherite Upgrade to exchange.
info.dragon_quest_1_start: ■ §3A guest? I wasn’t expecting anyone. Did you bring me something to eat?
info.dragon_quest_2_start: ■ §3Do you have any more interesting seafood dishes?
info.dragon_quest_3_end: ■ §3Oh, the cake got soggy. That was a bad idea, but thank you anyway.
info.dragon_quest_3_start: ■ §2The Mermorphs told me about some huge sweets. Do you know anything about that?
info.dragon_quest_4_end: ■ §3Great, you can install this at the entrance instead of a magma trap for fish.
info.dragon_quest_4_start: ■ §2Is there a block that can lift me up in water? Keep a little help from me.
info.dragon_quest_5_end: ■ §3Oh, redstone works so poorly underwater, what a pity.
info.dragon_quest_5_start: ■ §2I’ve got some amethyst and want to mess around with a redstone + sculk. Any ideas?
info.dragon_quest_6_end: ■ §3You’re very kind. I’d be glad to see you more often.
info.dragon_quest_6_start: ■ §2I have no hands to craft items. Is there a block that can help? A regular crafting table is not suitable.
info.dragon_quest_7_end: ■ §3Maybe I can turn it into armor for you.
info.dragon_quest_7_start: ■ §2A mermorph blacksmith has some special iron. Would you mind buying it for me?
info.dragon_quest_8_start: ■ §2I’d like to study a rare metal from the Nether.
info.dragon_quest_9_start: ■ §2Bring me some sturdy scute for armor crafting. I’ll forge something special for you.
info.mermorph_trade_limit: §4The Mermorph has temporarily run out of goods
info.no_water_bladder: You need to be underwater to use.
item.seadwellers.axolotl_treat.descripti: §b■ §7Axolotl will happily eat this and will §fheal§7 your wounds in return.
item.seadwellers.boiled_crab.description: §b■ §7It can’t help you harvest kelp anymore, but at least it’s tasty. Speeds up §fsneaking§7 and increases §fluck§7.
item.seadwellers.caviar_sandwich.descrip: §b■ §7A buttery sandwich with salty fish eggs on top.
item.seadwellers.deph_upgrade.descriptio: §b■ §7Maybe a §fdragon§7 will give you one someday to improve your equipment.
item.seadwellers.depth_boots.description: §b■ §fThese boots increase movement speed while underwater.
item.seadwellers.depth_hoe.description_0: §b■ §fGrants increased digging speed underwater and moistens farmland.
item.seadwellers.depth_ingot.description: §b■ §7Water-resistant metal that can be purchased from a §fblacksmith Mermorph§7.
item.seadwellers.depth_leggings.descript: §b■ §fThese leggings increase movement speed while underwater.
item.seadwellers.depth_sword.description: §b■ §fDeals damage to aquatic creatures and grants underwater bonuses.
item.seadwellers.kelp_shearer.descriptio: §b■ §7Used to collect aquatic §fvegetation§7 without destroying the lowest block.
item.seadwellers.mussel.description_0: §b■ §7Edible shellfish that can be grown on a rope.
item.seadwellers.potatoes_with_caviar.de: §b■ §7Tender mashed potatoes with crispy kelp and red caviar.
item.seadwellers.salmon_roe.description_: §b■ §7You can eat it or create a new life.
item.seadwellers.squid_stew.description_: §b■ §7If you add soy sauce, it won't move. Increases the §frange of reach§7.
item.seadwellers.swim_bladder.descriptio: §b■ §7Helps the fish not to drown. You can use this for comfortable §funderwater§7 construction.
